paragraphs.text: Upon Team Avatar's arrival in Jang Hui, Katara saw the distress of the villagers and decided to aid them, proposing that they stay another night. Sokka fiercely protested, arguing that it would severely disrupt their tight time schedule. To force them to stay, the young waterbender secretly fed Appa purple berries. The berries stained his tongue purple, making him appear sick, giving the group no choice but to stay until the sky bison recovered. Because of this, Katara was able to help the village at night while masked as the Painted Lady. Sokka later discovered her trickery when Toph accidentally ate some of the berries, which consequently dyed her tongue purple as well.
